item.title: $1200 Deal… But Big Work Ahead!
item.description: A $1,200 car deal means big repairs and upgrades — watch the team tackle the challenges and unlock the car’s potential.

item.title: $18K Offer… Deal Made!
item.description: A vintage car finds its buyer with an $18K offer — a successful deal showcasing the value and charm of classic automobiles.

item.title: It's Time To Set Those Yearlings Free! Back To The Nature!
item.description: Watch as rescued bear yearlings are carefully returned to the wild — a heartwarming moment of freedom and conservation in action.

item.title: Paid Too Much… But Worth It!
item.description: Sometimes you pay more than expected, but the value and satisfaction of a great car or truck make it worth every penny!

item.title: This Electric Car Is Super Slow..
item.description: A look at an electric car that’s slower than expected — exploring performance, mechanics, and what affects its pace.

item.title: Will They Find Good Pieces For Their Customers?
item.description: The team searches for quality vintage pieces for their customers — a mix of history, style, and careful selection in every find.

item.title: Vintage Find Sparks Hilarious Bargain
item.description: A surprising vintage discovery turns into a humorous bargain — blending history, style, and unexpected deals for collectors.

item.title: This Isn’t a Car… It’s an Experience
item.description: Step inside a vintage car that’s more than just a ride — it’s style, history, and craftsmanship all in one unforgettable experience.

item.title: The Parts Are Not Ready, He Has A Month Left!
item.description: The Parts Are Not Ready, He Has A Month Left! #car #classic #business

item.title: Checking Out A 1969 Camaro!
item.description: Take a closer look at the classic 1969 Camaro — iconic design, timeless style, and a favorite among car enthusiasts!

item.title: $20 Phones Turn Into $300!
item.description: Watch how inexpensive phones are transformed into higher-value deals — a clever look at buying, selling, and profit-making strategies.

item.title: This $500K Car Has No Cup Holders!
item.description: Check out a half-million-dollar classic car — luxurious and iconic, but surprisingly missing basic features like cup holders!

item.title: $3 Million On The Line—Will Jade Pay?
item.description: Tension rises as a $3 million jade deal hangs in the balance — will the payment go through or fall apart?

item.title: Turning A Van Into Race Headquarters!
item.description: Watch the creative process as a simple van is converted into a fully equipped race headquarters — built for speed and strategy.

item.title: This Ship Used To Be A German Engineering Masterpiece!

item.title: This Spot Might Not Be Good For The Drill!
item.description: The team examines a potential jade site but faces concerns about its suitability — careful planning is key before drilling.

item.title: This Will Be Their New Home!
item.description: See the transformation as this classic van gets ready for its next chapter — blending vintage charm with modern updates.

item.title: Movie Company Damaged Ted's Car!
item.description: A movie production accidentally damages Ted’s car — highlighting the unexpected challenges of filming with vehicles.

item.title: This B-100 Is A Beautiful Truck!
item.description: Take a closer look at the B-100 — a beautifully designed truck that combines classic style with practical features.

item.title: Ted's Personal Car Collection Is Fantastic!
item.description: Take a look at Ted’s stunning lineup of classic cars, including a beautiful Rolls-Royce — elegance and history on display.
